name: Int to String
req_funcs:
int_to_string:
    pusha
    mov bx, 10
    add di, 2
    mov byte [di+1], 0
.clean:
    mov byte [di], ' '
    dec di
    cmp di, {OUTPUT_VAR}
    jge .clean
    add di, 2
.loop:
    xor dx, dx
    div bx
    add dl, '0'
    mov [di], dl
    dec di
    or ax, ax
    jnz .loop
    popa
    ret
